title: Set up your SSI Wallet
subtitle: Self-Sovereign Identity (SSI) is a digital framework that gives individuals and organizations full ownership and control over their data. To securely publish assets and access resources across the dataspace, you will need to configure your SSI Wallet with DIDs and Verifiable Credentials.
body: Access your companyâ€™s SSI Wallet interface to configure the DIDs and Verifiable Credentials.
